actions.committee: Senate Committee on Agriculture and Forestry
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Agriculture and Forestry.

official_title: A bill to amend the food stamp act of 1964 in order to permit eligible households living in remote areas of Alaska to use food stamp coupons for the purchase of ammunition.

summary.text: Authorizes, under the Food Stamp Act of 1964, eligible households living in remote areas of Alaska to use food stamp coupons for the purchase of ammunition, where such households depend to a substantial extent on the use of firearms to kill game for food.

titles.title: A bill to amend the food stamp act of 1964 in order to permit eligible households living in remote areas of Alaska to use food stamp coupons for the purchase of ammunition.
